sentence.Network_en: His prose is vigorous and dense, occasionally to the point of obscurity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的散文文笔有力、内容庞杂，有时几近晦涩。

sentence.Network_en: Occasionally a patient is so debilitated that he must be fed intravenously.
sentence.Network_cn: 偶尔会有病人过于虚弱，必须通过静脉注射进食。

sentence.Network_en: Mrs Southern listened keenly, occasionally breaking in with pertinent questions.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨瑟恩夫人兴致勃勃地听着，间或插话问一些相关的问题。

entry.tran: 偶尔的；间或的；有时发生的
entry.def: Occasional means happening sometimes, but not regularly or often.

example.ex: I've had occasional mild headaches all my life...
example.tran: 间或发作的轻微头疼困扰了我一辈子。

example.ex: Esther used to visit him for the occasional days and weekends.
example.tran: 埃丝特过去会偶尔在周末或别的日子来探望他。

means.word_mean: 1. now and then or here and there;

sentences.sentence: "open areas are only occasionally interrupted by clumps of trees"
"now and again she would take her favorite book from the shelf and read to us"
"as we drove along, the beautiful scenery now and then attracted his attention"

auth_sentence.content: Occasionally she is at the mercy of these songwriters.
auth_sentence.res_content: Occasionally she is at the mercy of these songwriters.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Occasionally she is at the mercy of these songwriters.

auth_sentence.content: Bring the mixture to the boil, stirring occasionally.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bring the mixture to the boil, stirring occasionally.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bring the mixture to the boil, stirring occasionally.

auth_sentence.content: Occasionally, this sensation also occurs in the arms.
auth_sentence.res_content: Occasionally, this sensation also occurs in the arms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Occasionally, this sensation also occurs in the arms.

Sentence.sentence: Very special books are still occasionally produced on vellum, but they are one-of-a-kind show pieces.
Mass layoffs and plant closings have drawn plenty of headlines and public debate over the years, and they still occasionally do.

And now, if you'll walk this way, ladies and gentlemen, the next room we're going to see is the room in which the family used to hold their formal dinner parties and even occasionally entertain heads of state and royalty.
Why do the man say she would drop cups of tea at people occasionally?

sentences.en: Diligent students occasionally fail this subject.
sentences.cn: 用功的学生在这门功课上偶尔也不及格。

sentences.en: All I have to do in my job is answer the phone occasionally—it’s money for old rope.
sentences.cn: 我的全部工作只是偶尔接个电话,这钱赚得容易极了。

sentences.en: Farmers occasionally plow up old Indian relics.
sentences.cn: 农夫们偶尔能犁出古老的印第安人遗物。
